EmailTemplate.subject: We want to hear from you
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, At NCR, we are committed to helping you run your business better, giving you more time to take care of your customers and build for lasting success. We strive to improve every day, which is why we are asking for your help. Your responses to our customer satisfaction survey help us understand how we are serving you today and how else we can serve you even better tomorrow. If you haven’t already, please consider taking a few minutes to complete the NCR Customer Satisfaction Survey 2022 (sent from customer.success@feedback.ncr.com). Your insights are invaluable and help shape the future of NCR. As always, thank you for being an NCR customer. I appreciate your participation in advance.
